Paragraph: This type of file provides a human-readable format for storing and manipulating data when developers build software. It was initially designed based on Javascript object notation but has since grown in popularity, so many different languages are compatible with JSON data.

The JSON data format is an open standard file (.json) and data format used for data interchange through various forms of technology.
